home.title: DIY Lake Bathymetry Mapping
home.description: This project documents the development of an unmanned surface vehicle for inland lake depth mapping using consumer fishfinder hardware and NMEA 0183 protocol.

hardware.title: Hardware
hardware.desc: USV platform with removable fishfinder mount. Consumer sonar unit connects via NMEA 0183.

data.title: Data Collection
data.desc: GPS-tagged depth readings logged for post-processing into bathymetric maps.

methods.title: Methods
methods.desc: Open documentation of build process, calibration procedures, and data analysis.

blog.title: Project Log
blog.subtitle: Build notes, test results, and observations

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Technical reference for the bathymetry USV system
